mapper.insert: insert into notice_tb(notice_id, staff_id, notice_title, notice_content, comment,created_at) values(#{notice_id}, #{staff_id}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content},#{comment}, now())
mapper.update: update notice_tb set staff_id = #{staff_id}, notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, comment = #{comment}, created_at = NOW() where notice_id = #{notice_id}
